title: release: cannot install from .pkg into any dir except /usr/local/go
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?
1.7rc2

2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?
Mac OS 10.11.4, darwin amd64

3. What did you do?
I installed 1.7rc2 from the pkg build (go1.7rc2.darwin-amd64.pkg).  I had set GOROOT to a different directory, but it always installs to /usr/local/go.  

The documentation earlier, if I remember right, had a way to install to a different directory but even that is not there.

Is there no way to install it to a different directory?
